resources.string: if you don’t have an account
You must enter the valid species (taxon) name.
Location setting must be enabled on your device.
Location is not retrieved yet. Would you like to wait for location or cancel this entry?
Do you want to exit application?
New version of taxonomic database is available online. You can update it now or later from the application Setup. Would you like to update your database?
Warning: You are about to overwrite original location with your current location! Are you sure?
Biologer is an Open Source application issued under MIT license and designed to collect data on biodiversity in Eastern Europe.
Biologer was developed with funds from Rufford Small Grants (project Nos. 20507-B and 24652-B) and MAVA (project No. 15097).
To find out more details about Biologer, visit our web page:
You are currently logged into a database:
Do you want to logout from this Biologer database?
Here you can update the list of species and other taxa.
Application was unable to connect with database!
Biologer application can connect to multiple databases. You should start by choosing your preferred database and registering online.
Side panel provides all the shortcuts and settings you need. Just swipe the screen to the right and you are ready to go.
From the main screen you can add, edit or delete your observations and send the data to one of our servers.
Adding data is easy! Suggest the species, add some photos and Biologer will do the rest. Advanced options can also be unlocked from the Preferences.
The coordinate precision is less than 25 m. Would you like to wait for precise location?
Biologer’s database for species and other taxa is not downloaded from the server yet. Ensure that you have a stable internet connection to continue.
Temporary closed (publish as free after 3 years)
Closed (available to you and the editors)
Choose different license for your data collected through the application
Choose different license for your images sent through the application
Sets the project title if your data was collected during a project.
Displays notifications related with taxonomic updates.
Taxonomic database was not updated from the server. Ensure that you have a stable internet connection and retry.
After logging out from Biologer you can start the application again and log back into some of our online databases.
It looks like no user is currently logged in. Biologer will now exit allowing you to restart the application and log back in.
Biologer is currently updating taxonomic database. Would you like to cancel this operation?
Taxonomic tree is partially updated. To get full options from this application you can complete updating from Biologer Preferences.

Biologer could not retrieve data about your image and data licences from server. Having stable internet you can retry this operation, or you can setup custom data licenses from the Biologer Preferences.
Re-downloads entire taxonomic tree in your application from Biologer server.
Updating taxonomic database from the server. Please be patient.
Downloading new taxonomic database from the server is paused.
Downloading new taxonomic database is canceled by the user.
It looks like you selected an unknown taxon. Do you want to save it anyway?
Enables advanced options that could be entered with your occurrence (i.e. number of individuals, stage, sex).
Cannot get response (token) from the server. Check the internet connection.
No photos selected from the Gallery.
Display notifications for uploading entries to the server.
Uploading observations canceled by the user.
It looks like the image was deleted from your device! Please review the topmost entry and delete or replace the image before proceeding to the upload.

Important notice! Notifications are not enabled for channel \"biologer_taxa\". Biologer will not be able to receive species list from internet, which is required for sending correct species names along with field observations.
Important notice! Notifications are not enabled for channel \"biologer_entries\". Biologer will not be able to upload your observations online, which is one of its core functionality.

Important notice: notifications are not enabled! This means that Biologer will not be able to receive species list or upload your records online. Enabling notifications in Android OS is required for most of application core functions and it will not work properly without this settings enabled.
Allows data to be automatically downloaded and uploaded without user intervention. By default the data will be transferred only on WiFi.
Allows Biologer to list english names for the species even if the phone locale is set to other language.
This image does not exist on your device anymore!
0. Species observed but suspected to be still on migration or to be summering non-breeder
1. Species observed in breeding season in possible nesting habitat
2. Singing male(s) present (or breeding calls heard) in breeding season
3. Pair observed in suitable nesting habitat in breeding season
4. Permanent territory presumed through registration of territorial behaviour (song, etc.) on at least two different days a week or more apart at the same place
7. Agitated behaviour or anxiety calls from adults
8. Brood patch on adult examined in the hand
11. Used nest or eggshells found (occupied or laid within period of survey)
12. Recently fledged young (nidicolous species) or downy young (nidifugous species)
13. Adults entering or leaving nest-site in circumstances indicating occupied nest (including high nests or nest-holes, the contents of which can not be seen) or adult seen incubating
14. Adult carrying faecal sac or food for young
16. Nest with young seen or heard
Sets the life stage to adult by default, if adult stage exist for observed taxa.
by filling this simple form. Make sure you
and choose license to define how you share data with others. Detailed description of the licenses could be found on the web
This email address is already registered
Registration is almost complete! To check it this was you, we will send an email with confirmation link. Open that link to verify your email and you could login to Biologer.

Your email address is not confirmed yet! We have sent you an email with confirmation link, just click on it and you are good to go. Depending on the server overload, there could be some delay before you receive the confirmation link.
The given user does not exist on this server. Maybe you are trying to connect to the wrong database?
Cannot get response from the server!
Your login token has expired, but we could not refresh it from the internet!
By selecting only certain groups (i.e. birds, butterflies or plants) it will be easier to find species for data entry. Other species will not pop up in the drop down menu.
SQL database structure changed. Biologer will log you back in and download user data from server.
Could not login after internal Biologer SQL database updated. Biologer will be closed now. You should check your network and try to login later.
Keep authorship and share online with watermark
Keep authorship and restrict images from public domain
Map activity could not be loaded for some reason.
Map fragment could not be loaded for some reason.
"Export was successful. File is saved in: "
All observation are deleted from the list.
You are about to delete every single data collected on the field! Are you sure about this?
Biologer is already downloading taxa! You should wait for this process to finish and download taxa from Biologer Preferences.

You have selected new taxonomic group and Biologer should download it from the network. It is recommended that you do this now, but it can also be accomplished from the Preferences once you rich stable network connection.
Uploading of entry was not successful!
Your login token expired after one year of use. Biologer will exit not since there is no internet connection to refresh the login token!
Biologer could not take a photo without permission to access your file system and camera. Would you like to enable this permissions?
Biologer could not take a photo without your permission to access camera. Would you like to enable this permissions?

Biologer is intended to collect species occurrences in the field, thus the geographic location is very important for each record. It is highly recommended that you allow Biologer to access your location, but you can also manually pick a location using map.
Biologer needs a permission to access your image files from gallery. Would you like to give it a permit to read storage on your phone?

Your field records will appear here. To add new observation of a species, just use the “+” sign and fill in the form. After you rich the stable internet connection, use the upload button to send all your records on the server.
Congratulations! Your data is now safely uploaded on %1$s server. You can access, edit and export them by logging in the web page using web browser.
Location is currently disabled on this device. Would you like to turn it on?
You are about to register to database hosted at %1$s. Note that Biologer application can be used with variety of biologer communities in different regions.
Your privacy and data sharing preferences are very important for every Biologer community! In order to use this platform,
you must read privacy policy and understand how we use your personal data
to validate each species observation from the field.
Also, feel free to choose how to share your field observations and photos with the rest of the world by
Local Biologer community in Bosnia and Herzegovina
Database of Bird protection and study society of Serbia
Developmental database, only for playing and testing

Your email address is not confirmed! Your registration was successful and you can use some basic functionality of Biologer. However, you will not be able to submit your species observations before validating email address.

License for data with a limited geographical view

This license specifies the terms and conditions of Biologer "limited view" data usage from the database. Data is displayed on the map in the form of a 10×10 km square.

The basis of this license is Creative Commons License, Attribution-Noncommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International (CC BY-NC-SA 4.0). This means that data with limited are allowed to be shared with third parties under the terms of the Creative Commons licenses.

The difference compared to a completely open data is only reflected in the precision of the geographical location and the date of observation. Limited data view allows displaying of locations in the form of a 10×10 km squares, without the possibility of showing places more accurately to other users of the database and hiding data about the month and day of records. Other information that came with the observations will be fully shown. This applies both to the data view within Biologer and to the data that are available for export from the database or sharing within larges systems for data aggregation.

By selecting this license authors retain all rights to use the precise location and date of their observations. %1$s administrators and taxonomic experts reserve the right to use all data entered under this license in order to produce the documents of national importance, for nature conservation (Red Book, Red List, revision of legislature, defining the borders of protested areas, etc.), as well as for statistical data processing (e.g. scientific publications, protection and conservation of the species and their habitats) but without publicly releasing the exact location of the original data. In the case that the location of the original data, which is recorded under this license, is needed for publishing, Administrators of %1$s and taxonomic experts must do so with the consent of the authors.

License for data with temporary limited access (closes for 3 years)

This license specifies the terms and conditions of the data usage from Biologer database for users who do not want to instantly share their data with others. Data is hidden for 3 first years and does not appear on the map, but will be completely published afterwards. Such way of saving data could be useful if the data has been collected for a scientific study, leaving enough time to the author to independently publish data before their publication in Biologer platform.

Selecting this license temporary restricts the visibility of data for other users of the database. In the first 3 years after the data entry, it will be visible only to the author of the observation, to the taxonomic experts who verify the findings and to the website administrators. Data under this license will not be instantly shown on the taxa distribution maps, and other users will not be able to export this kind of data from the database. In 3 years after the observation is entered into database, the data becomes open and will be shared under the conditions of the Creative Commons license Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International (CC BY-SA 4.0).

By selecting this license authors retain all rights to the data they entered. %1$s administrators and taxonomic experts reserve the right to use data entered under this license in order to produce the documents of national importance, for nature conservation (Red Book, Red List, revision of legislature, defining borders of the protected areas etc.), as well as for statistical data processing (e.g. protection and conservation of the taxa and their habitats) but without publicly releasing the exact location of the original data. In scientific publications, this data could only be used in summary form, without details about original record. In the case that the location of the original data, which is recorded under this license, is required for publishing, Administrators of %1$s and taxonomic experts must do so with the consent of the authors.

License for data with limited access rights

This license specifies the terms and conditions of the data usage from %1$s database for users who do not want to share their data with others. Data is hidden and does not appear on the map.

Selecting this license restricts the visibility of data for other users of the database. Entered data will be visible only to the author of the observation, to the taxonomic experts who verify the findings and to the website administrators. Data under this license will not be shown on the taxon distribution maps, and other users will not be able to export this kind of data from the database.

By selecting this license authors retain all rights to the data they entered. %1$s administrators and taxonomic experts reserve the right to use data entered under this license in order to produce the documents of national importance, for nature conservation (Red Book, Red List, revision of legislature, defining borders of the protected areas etc.), as well as for statistical data processing (e.g. protection and conservation of the species and their habitats) but without publicly releasing the exact location of the original data. In scientific publications, this data could only be used in summary form, without details about original record. In the case that the location of the original data, which is recorded under this license, is required for publishing, Administrators of %1$s and taxonomic experts must do so with the consent of the authors.

Due to the limitations in verification of the data uploaded under this license and the inability of detailed data display, Biologer team does not recommend choosing this license!

License for images with restricted rights

This license specifies the terms and conditions for usage of images from Biologer database for users who want to keep their full authorship. The images will be shown in public part of the web platform using watermark, while authors will retain all the rights for using such photographs.

The use of photographs with restricted rights fully depends on the author and such images could not be shared out of Biologer platform without author’s consent. Local Biologer communities restrict right to share such images for promotion (such as sharing information on interesting species observations on social network), but must clearly state the authorship and keep the watermark on the image.

License for images with restricted access

This license specifies the terms and conditions for usage of images from Biologer database for users who don’t want to share their images with others. The images will be hidden and will not be shown in the public part of the web platform at all.

The use of photographs with restricted access is limited to the Administrators, taxonomic experts and the authors, that will use images just for identification of the taxa from the photographs. The display and use of such photographs out of closed part of the Biologer platform is forbidden.

According to the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), that is active since May 25th 2018, the user allows „Biologer Community“ to collect his personal data: first name, last name, e-mail address, institution name, location given as geographical coordinates of the place where a particular taxon has bean recorded and the time of the record.

These data could only be used for the purposes and in a means listed in this document and further constrained by the licenses selected by the user. Biologer project team can changes this privacy policy, but must inform the users about the change. Persons responsible for implementation of the General Data Protection Regulation are the Administrators of the Local Biologer community at %1$s

Local community defines licenses for using data about taxa observation, which could contain your personal data. By selecting the default data license the user can chose what to share with others (see the licences page). User can change the license that will apply to new data delivered to Local Community, or send a request to the Responsible persons in order to change the license of existing data. Biologer supports open software and open, scientifically verifiable data and we do not recommend users to use closed licenses. Good scientific practice must ensure that the all records from the field can be verifiable, thus for each observation Biologer shows who (name, surname and institution), where (geographic coordinates or UTM square) and when (which date) certain taxa has bean recorded. If a user would like to restrict access to his personal data for people outside of the editorial board (administrators and taxonomic experts for a particular group), closed license can be chosen.

Biologer is committed to maintain privacy of the users and will take all technical and organisational measures to protect user’s personal data, with guarantee not to distribute or sell restricted data to third parties without permission of the user. In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation, the user can use its legal rights in order to get a confirmation about the data usage, get a query of his personal data, correct and amend his personal data, ask to be excluded from further data processing, to block illegal data processing, to ask for deletion of his personal data and user account without any negative consequences, to take a copy of his personal data for saving them to other software platform, etc. The user request can be send to the persons responsible for implementation of the General Data Protection Regulation using e-mail address. When submitting the request it is required to give your name and surname, institution and the email address of the account registered within Local community.

Biologer web platform may, in accordance with the law, collect certain data about its users obtained during the website usage. This information can be used for displaying user activity statistics, and for improving and customizing the website and its content. In this case, contact information, except for user name and surname, will not be displayed.

Collected personal information can be accessed by developers and administrators of the Biologer Local community and persons engaged in processing the information on our behalf for the purposes specified in this policy.

Users are responsible for entering correct personal information on their user account, primarily their full name, surname and email address. This is important since we would like to connect your field observations with you and to ensure verification of these data in the future.

Users should enter correct data on the species observations from the field, while forged entries are considered strict offence of our terms of use. Wrong data on species distribution are not good for anything and our editorial board is trying to minimise the number of such records.
Users should respect other person’ opinion and use proper language in online communication.

In case of violation of these rules, responsible persons can warn the user or, in the final case, exclude the user from Biologer community. Biologer reserves the right to keep the users data in case of violations of the terms of use and illegal use of the site by users.
Adds location name along with observations from the field. This location will be used while you are within the same area.
It looks like you move away from \"%1$s\"? If you are somewhere else now the location name should be updated or deleted.
Unknown error occurred! Couldn\'t get resized image.
Biologer uses notifications to receive species list or upload your records online and will not work properly without them.
Notifications are disabled. Some basic Biologer features will not work.
No permission to take picture from camera. Observations will have no images.
No permission to take picture from gallery. Observations will have no images.
